channel.title: How to run Nrs3 server source? (When I run it It Closes Automatically)
channel.description: I download the nrs3 server and when I Tried to run it it kept closing I did put the cache in but then it ran and got an error ("can't find drop files"). So I closed It. Then it still wasnt working please help me.

item.title: How to run Nrs3 server source? (When I run it It Closes Automatically)
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

Well put the cache in -

NRS3server 667\716 server backup\716 server backup\data

then change the run to -

@echo off title Disturbed 704 echo starting... "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause

hope that helped

Read full topic
item.source: How to run Nrs3 server source? (When I run it It Closes Automatically)

item.title: How to run Nrs3 server source? (When I run it It Closes Automatically)
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“kingcobra805, post:6, topic:448959”][quote author=DerpaDerpy link=topic=551855.msg4043304#msg4043304 date=1341852753]
This is what you call a “Anti-Leech” if you knew basic java and read the error more closely and followed it, you could figure it out.
[/quote]

Lmao, you dont even know what your talking about; thats not even close to a anti-leech.

OT: its missing the drops.bin file, i do beleive it was supposed to come with it so id advise maybe re downloading nrs.[/quote] Everybody keeps telling me that is an anti-leech, i’m just following what they say it is… My bad.

Read full topic
